original_text: And this thing became sin to the house of Jeroboam, so as to cut it off and to destroy it from the face of the earth.
korean_text: 이 일이 여로보암 집에 죄가 되어 그 집이 땅 위에서 끊어져 멸망하게 되니라

sentences.original_text: And this thing became sin to the house of Jeroboam
sentences.korean_translation: 이 일은 여로보암의 집에 죄가 되었고

sentences.original_text: so as to cut it off
and to destroy it from the face of the earth.
